subject: Soccer
Football Association Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Carlos Tevez had a hat trick for Manchester City, who will play in the semifinals at Wembley Stadium next month, in a 5-0 rout of Barnsley in the F.A. Cup.
snippet: Carlos Tevez had a hat trick for Manchester City, who will play in the semifinals at Wembley Stadium next month, in a 5-0 rout of Barnsley in the F.A. Cup.
